name: mikwewa-free
title: MiWwewa's Free Maps Bundle
description:
This module created by mapmakers Mik & Wewa now brings over 160 of their hand drawn maps to FVTT, more than doubling their previous offering, with many of the maps providing variations on lighting and theme. Their compendium of scenes includes a wide variety of dungeons, caverns, and outdoor scenes to challenge your players, as well as ten unique shops to entertain them when they return to town!

All maps have been pre-configured with walls and lighting, and updated to incorporate support for Foundry VTT's advanced lighting animations. Enjoy your adventuring and have fun!
author: Mik and Wewa
